name: Suzy The Lier
description:
This game is not complete, and it was just submitted so that I get to work on anther game jam, sorry for the unconvinced.

How To Play:

  • Suzy is a sweet lil. demo girl that uses her curtness and lies to get what she wants.
  • When jumping over some platforms, it gives a number indicating how many of  the connected platforms that if jumped over Suzy's lies are revealed (you lose)
  • Throw the process of elimination; figure out how to jump over the platforms without getting caught.

The puzzle-part of the game is inspired by Minesweeper.
